pkgmetadata.longdescription: aiohttp-openmetrics===================This project contains a simple middleware and /metrics route endpoint foraiohttp that allow easy implementation of the`openmetrics <https://www.openmetrics.org/>`_ protocol.At the moment, this package is a thin wrapper around the ``prometheus_client``package.Example usage-------------.. code-block:: python from aiohttp import web from aiohttp_openmetrics import metrics, metrics_middleware app = web.Application() app.middlewares.append(metrics_middlware) app.router.add_get('/metrics', metrics) web.run_app(app)License-------This package is licensed under the Apache v2 or later license.
